oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Interaction of a weak discontinuity with elementary waves of Riemann problem
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: RADHA, R
SHARMA, VD
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: CHARACTERISTIC SHOCKS
ACCELERATION-WAVES
EVOLUTION
GAS
BEHAVIOR
SYSTEMS
FLOWS
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study the interaction of a weak discontinuity wave with the elementary waves of the Riemann problem for the one-dimensional Euler equations governing the flow of ideal polytropic gases, and investigate the effects of initial states, and the shock strength on the jumps in shock acceleration and the reflected and transmitted waves. (C) 2012 American Institute of Physics. [doi:10.1063/1.3671383]
